LanguageData.CraftingSpot.label: crafting spot
LanguageData.CraftingSpot.description: A place for crafting simple things like shivs or bows.
LanguageData.TableSculpting.label: sculptor's table
LanguageData.TableSculpting.description: A workbench equipped for artistic sculpting.
LanguageData.TableButcher.label: butcher table
LanguageData.TableButcher.description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.
LanguageData.HandTailoringBench.label: hand tailor bench
LanguageData.HandTailoringBench.description: A workbench for tailoring clothes by hand. Works at 50% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.
LanguageData.ElectricTailoringBench.label: electric tailor bench
LanguageData.ElectricTailoringBench.description: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 40% of normal speed.
LanguageData.FueledSmithy.label: fueled smithy
LanguageData.FueledSmithy.description: A wood-fueled station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy.label: electric smithy
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy.description: An electric-powered station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.TableMachining.label: machining table
LanguageData.TableMachining.description: A work station for assembling and disassembling machinery such as guns or mechanoid corpses.
LanguageData.ElectricStove.label: electric stove
LanguageData.ElectricStove.description: An electrically-powered stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.FueledStove.label: fueled stove
LanguageData.FueledStove.description: A simple wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.label: stonecutter's table
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.description: A work table equipped to cut rough stone into usable blocks.
LanguageData.Brewery.label: brewery
LanguageData.Brewery.description: A work station with all the equipment needed to brew beer.
LanguageData.DrugLab.label: drug lab
LanguageData.DrugLab.description: A work bench equipped with various containers, heaters, and measurement equipment for producing a variety of drugs.
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.label: electric smelter
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.description: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.Refinery.label: refinery
LanguageData.Refinery.description: A chemical refining plant. Used to refine wood into chemfuel.
LanguageData.ComponentAssemblyBench.label: component assembly bench
LanguageData.ComponentAssemblyBench.description: A workbench equipped with advanced tools for producing components from simpler materials.
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench.label: simple research bench
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench.description: A simple bench with writing implements and low-tech scientific tools. Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench.label: hi-tech research bench
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Research is sped up by the high-tech tools. Requires power.
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium.label: electric crematorium
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.label: hydroponics basin
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.description: Grows plants quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires power to work; plants will die if power is cut.
LanguageData.FermentingBarrel.label: fermenting barrel
LanguageData.FermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting raw wort into beer.
LanguageData.DeepDrill.label: deep drill
LanguageData.DeepDrill.description: A deep-crust drilling rig for extracting minerals from deep under the surface. Use a ground-penetrating scanner to detect the resources.
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.label: nutrient paste dispenser
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.description: Synthesizes nutrient paste from organic feedstocks. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.
LanguageData.Hopper.label: hopper
LanguageData.Hopper.description: Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers.
